desc:
Gina was once engulfed in the world of stardom and

class. Being the daughter of the wealthiest, most

brutal business magnate known in the world,

she easily found herself following in her footsteps,

inheriting her mother's savviness and style.


But she isn't cut out for the limelight--it

just isnt her style. One day, she met a

quick-witted employee at her father's

enterprise, Bruno, and the rest is history.
